record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME -- (Senate - April 24, 2008)

[Page: S3412]

speaking.paragraph: I understand that H.R. 5613 is at the desk.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 5613) to extend certain moratoria and impose additional moratoria on certain Medicaid regulations through April 1, 2009, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask for its second reading but then object to my own request.

record.chair: The bill will be read the second time on the next legislative day.
